metadata.title: CVE-2015-5602 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: sudoedit in Sudo before 1.8.15 allows local users to gain privileges via asymlink attack on a file whose full path is defined using multiplewildcards in /etc/sudoers, as demonstrated by "/home/*/*/file.txt."

criterions.comment: sudo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
